html:
1.20.20  8:41 pm   how is 2020 gong

     ok

1.20.20  8:26 pm   when are you going to talk about velcro like you said you would?

     when velcro improves more

1.20.20  8:09 pm   your videos helped me through a dark place when my parents kicked me out when I turned 18 and skipped state leaving me no help, and the feeling of being all on my own for the first time really positively resonated with your videos, have you ever struggled with a bad living situation? 

     yes! i live in purgatory

1.20.20  7:57 pm   i don't remember what question i asked you. how can i tell which one it was

     it's this one

1.20.20  7:53 pm   I wish you would teach us some stuff, because you do it very well. Will you?

     yes

1.20.20  7:32 pm   I've been working pretty hard on music for a couple of years now and have recently stepped it up to basically any time I have free time. That's great and all, but I'm realizing I kind of don't have much of anything going on in my life to inspire new material. Is there any magic place you look to for inspiration for your projects, or is it just stuff that randomly pops in your head, like from a dream?

     inspiration is everywhere. in some cases the nearest inspiration may be behind you

1.20.20  7:19 pm   i can't think of anything good to ask you, can you just come up with some thought-provoking question for yourself so that you can answer said question in an equally thought-provoking way? 

     yes, which way is up, it's all around you

1.20.20  7:11 pm   i feel like i have ptsd when dealing with customer support, got any therapy recomendations?

     no, but i do have some therapy recommendations for anyone who is a customer seeking customer support. which is to treat the representative like your most dear friend or family member, while also staying true to your need for support from the company. and be open to the representative's personal needs as well

1.20.20  7:09 pm   which music you like ? 

     surprise me

1.20.20  7:04 pm   what boxes tastes like?

     bags

1.20.20  6:54 pm   how do you amswer the questions?

     i'm not sure

1.20.20  6:32 pm   why is it spelled ueqstions and not questions?

     it's not ueqstions, it's ueqstions

1.20.20  6:22 pm   would you do a concert?

     yes

      it would be awesome!

     only if i take the responsibility to make it awesome

1.20.20  6:08 pm   How do you think your songs have evolved from the beginning of your YouTube career to now?

     at least half of the evolution occured before i ever touched youtube, but the general trend is that they are more and more focused on bugs and insects in general

1.20.20  6:01 pm   So in your music videos, you play air drums, but you're actually hitting the right drums and cymbals. Do you have a drumset,

     yes

      and how long have you played?

     my entire life

1.20.20  5:55 pm   Did you create the George Clooney video specifically to respond to someone's question?

     it was perhaps in response to all the vine comments asking me what songs/music i was 'using' for my videos

1.20.20  5:41 pm   will you make an album and sell it on vinyl?

     when i make cumerbunds. there will by vinyl records to go with the cumerbunds. because let's face it how many times have you put on a cumerbund and then had no records to listen to, dang happens all the time. well i hope to fix this

1.20.20  5:35 pm   did the piano ever played you?

     it's possible

     OR DID IT PLAYED YOU ALL THIS TIME

     some of the time

1.20.20  5:19 pm   Can you please show us more of your style of drumming on an acoustic kit?

     yes

     The Scary Pockets videos made me realize your style of drumming translates well from your Logic Pro arrangements to acoustic kits,

     actually it was the other way around, i'm sure

      which sort of surprised me and intrigued me. Would love to see and hear more of you drumming. It would be both interesting and reasonable.

     that is true, although i still need even more real estate for that

1.20.20  5:13 pm   Hi bill, any thoughts about Portugal?

     it's pretty good

     Maybe going there wouldnt be bad

     you have a good point

1.20.20  4:31 pm   Hi I have 2 questions
1: How should I spend my 1 week waiting for my theatre classes to start

     watch some plays

     2: If you would write a musical what would it be about

     anything generally from this universe or that could be in this universe, or another

1.20.20  4:03 pm   is it fun playing with the instruments

     sort of, but if that ever gets boring, try using them for stuff. like songs, or corporate training presentations

1.20.20  4:02 pm   Why haven't u been making vids

     because i am learning how the heck to make vids

1.20.20  3:48 pm   Can you make your songs so that way people can find the way of happiness in life?

     sure

1.20.20  3:46 pm   Can someone think of nothing?

     not on purpose

1.20.20  3:35 pm   Drums or Piano?

     you are gonna need them both at some point

1.20.20  3:24 pm   just did a bad thing

     ah, #relatable

1.20.20  3:03 pm   What do you think your target fan base is? Age wise.

     i think you're thinking of it all wrong

1.20.20  3:01 pm   How was the universe made?

     i am trying to explain

1.20.20  2:45 pm   What process do you go through to make a jingle in your videos?

     it's kind of like making waves. you can't actually make waves, all you can do is nudge the water

     And is there any jingle in particular that is your favorite?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

     Mine's the Chandragupta one. So calming!

1.20.20  2:24 pm   What did you use for videomaking?

     we'll see

1.20.20  2:21 pm   what are your opinions on the year 2020 so far?

     it is a leap year, for sure

1.20.20  1:41 pm   is there anything predictable about you?

     yes

1.20.20  1:39 pm   hi bill! i love your videos and i've covered a few of your songs, you're my inspiration!
Anyway, i wanted to ask what drives you to make music!

     music itself

1.20.20  1:27 pm   why r u so hot

     that is due to me being so normal

1.20.20  1:17 pm   thoughts on graham crackers

     too tall

1.20.20  1:06 pm   some thoughts on opinions?

     fake

1.20.20  1:00 pm   are metric or imperial allen keys better

     need one that has both

1.20.20  12:58 pm   What piano do you use

     regular

1.20.20  12:55 pm   would you recommend eating the sun

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.20.20  12:47 pm   Opinion on fax machines?

     never heard of them

1.20.20  12:44 pm   Have you eaten an octopus?

     no

1.20.20  12:34 pm   what do you think of the circle of 5ths? 

     it can connect and go all the way around, thanks to a logarythmic magic trick

1.20.20  12:33 pm   your music really helped me. school was really hard last year and i would come home to be yelled at. whenever i needed someone, i could just listen to your music. thank you, bill

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

1.20.20  12:19 pm   does it farngle up a song to sing the lyrics an octave lower than the recording?

     a little bit

     i have trouble hitting the higher notes

     could be interesting to find a harmony part somewhere in the middle

1.20.20  12:18 pm   While making the video for a finished song, have you ever had the urge to go back and mess with the song some more?

     yes

      If so, how did you fight that urge?

     it takes a lot of courage to seal a song as done. if you open it up again, you're gonna have to go through all that again

1.20.20  11:53 am   What's your favorite day?

     Today

1.20.20  11:31 am   You ever wonder if rocks have feelings?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      I put googly eyes on my pet rock, great experience.

     clearly you have no regard for the rock's feelings

1.20.20  11:24 am   Sun taste like what?

     light

1.20.20  11:23 am   How do I get good at making stuff?

     by making stuff. that might not be what you wanted to hear .... hopefully you like making stuff
